name: IdleVania
description:
IdleVania

Idle game meets metroidvania. Collect spirits to upgrade your tree's mana production, spend mana to upgrade yourself.

You win by buying the last upgrade.

Updated to (sort of!) run in the browser. Runs poorly, would recommend playing the desktop executable instead.

[ Keyboard ]
Arrow Keys to move around
Z / Up / Space to Jump
X to Attack
Left Shift to Dash (when unlocked)
Left Ctrl to Heal (when unlocked)
Escape to pause and close menus

[ Gamepad ]
Left Joystick / D-Pad to move around
A to Jump
B to Attack
X to Dash (when unlocked)
Y to Heal (when unlocked)
Start to pause and close menus
